metadata.title: CVE-2021-30846 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, Safari 15, tvOS 15, iOS 15 andiPadOS 15, watchOS 8. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
